%% PoTicTac User Journey Diagram
%% Maps the user's path through the application to identify friction points

journey
    title PoTicTac User Journey - First-Time Player
    
    section Discovery
      Find the game: 5: Player
      Load website: 5: Player, System
      See retro design: 5: Player
    
    section Onboarding
      Enter player name: 4: Player
      Choose Single Player: 5: Player
      Select difficulty: 5: Player
      Click Start Game: 5: Player
    
    section Gameplay
      See 6x6 board: 5: Player
      Make first move: 5: Player
      Wait for AI: 4: Player, AI
      Continue playing: 5: Player
      See winning move: 5: Player
    
    section Victory/Defeat
      See result modal: 5: Player, System
      View stats update: 4: Player
      Click Play Again: 5: Player
    
    section Engagement
      Check Leaderboard: 4: Player
      See ranking: 5: Player
      Return to play: 5: Player
